views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11.

Hide the notch on the iPhone X. Coming sometime in the future:
- Select on which apps to enable and disable
- Fix buggy landscape mode

Known bugs:
- Cannot click breadcrumbs
- black view hides content on fullscreen portrait mode apps (fix coming on next version)
Feel free to report new ones by email

No options to configure.


Source code available

- Fixed all fullscreen apps instead of just landscape ones now - Properly fixed double status bar on Control Center
- Fixed overlapping status bar on Control Center
- The whole notch cover hides on landscape mode now
